input_text:
Job Title: Principal Design Engineer

Location: Racine, WI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
At Modine, we are engineering a cleaner, healthier world. Building on more than 100 years of excellence in thermal management, we provide trusted systems and solutions that improve air quality and conserve natural resources. More than 13,000 employees are at work in every corner of the globe, delivering the solutions our customers need, where they need them. Our Climate Solutions and Performance Technologies segments support our purpose by improving air quality, reducing energy and water consumption, lowering harmful emissions and enabling cleaner running vehicles and environmentally-friendly refrigerants. Modine is a global company headquartered in Racine, Wisconsin (USA), with operations in North America, South America, Europe and Asia. For more information about Modine, visit www.modine.com.

Position Description

We are currently recruiting to fill a Product Development Engineer position at our global headquarters location in Racine, Wisconsin. This role is responsible for activities involved in the design, development, and test of new technology platforms for the group. You will be working closely with other engineers and technicians to apply these technologies to develop new products. Areas of interest are the development of refrigerant-based packaged heating systems and alternative fuel in gas-fired applications. This opportunity will be a full-time, salaried position.

Key Responsibilities

Complete projects and tasks related to various engineering activities and support Product/Design Engineers and Manufacturing Engineers with:Product DevelopmentCAD ModelingProduct LaunchSpecifications and Process DocumentationEngineering CalculationsTesting and certification to applicable safety and performance standardsProduct troubleshooting

Required Education & Qualifications

B.S. degree from accredited universityPreferred 10+ years of experience with developing HVAC equipment (refrigerant systems/products)Working knowledge of UL/CSA requirements, engineering/manufacturing change processes, vapor compression, natural refrigerants, and heat transfer principlesPossess strong engineering and analytical skills to make data-driven decisions based on testing and simulation outputBasic solid modeling and drawing skill set (using commercial CAD package, e.g. Solid Edge)Basic understanding of engineering drawings and mechanical systemsProficient computer skills and in-depth knowledge of relevant software such as MS Office Suite.Dedicated to quality and safetyExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsAbility to work in a team environment 

Modine is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Modine provides a competitive benefit package, which could include paid vacation, short term disability, 401(k), health, dental, vision, life insurance, flex spending benefits, tuition reimbursement, Health Savings Account and much more. Human Resources will provide more detail upon your hiring.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
